channel.title: AI on Cloudflare Docs
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Cloudflare Docs

item.title: Automatic captioning for video uploads
item.description: Automatic captioning for video uploads ​​ Introduction Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) models have revolutionized the accessibility of video content by enabling the generation of subtitles and translations. These models utilize advanced algorithms to transcribe spoken words into text with high accuracy.

item.title: Choose the Right Text Generation Model
item.description: Choose the Right Text Generation Model Last reviewed: February 6, 2024 A great way to explore the models that are available to you on Workers AI is to use a Jupyter Notebook External link icon Open external link .

item.title: Composable AI architecture
item.description: Composable AI architecture ​​ Introduction The AI market is witnessing a rapid evolution, propelled by the swift pace of technological advancement. With breakthroughs occurring frequently, staying up-to-date with the latest innovations is imperative for organizations aiming to remain competitive.

item.title: Content-based asset creation
item.description: Content-based asset creation ​​ Introduction Combining text-generation models with text-to-image models can lead to powerful AI systems capable of generating visual content based on input prompts. This integration can be achieved through a collaborative framework where a text-generation model generates prompts for the text-to-image model based on input text.

item.title: Create a fine-tuned OpenAI model with R2
item.description: Create a fine-tuned OpenAI model with R2 Last reviewed: June 7, 2024 In this tutorial, you will use the OpenAI External link icon Open external link API and Cloudflare R2 to create a fine-tuned model External link icon Open external link .

item.title: Multi-vendor AI observability and control
item.description: Multi-vendor AI observability and control ​​ Introduction The AI landscape is rapidly evolving with new models, services, and applications emerging daily. Many developers and organizations seek to enhance agility by opting for inference-as-a-service solutions like Workers AI, rather than developing or managing models themselves.

item.title: Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG)
item.description: Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) Architecture ​​ Introduction Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) is an innovative approach in natural language processing that integrates retrieval mechanisms with generative models to enhance text generation.

item.title: Build a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) AI
item.description: Build a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) AI Last reviewed: September 25, 2023 This guide will instruct you through setting up and deploying your first application with Cloudflare AI. You will build a fully-featured AI-powered application, using tools like Workers AI, Vectorize, D1, and Cloudflare Workers.

item.title: Recommend products on e-commerce sites using Workers AI and Stripe
item.description: Recommend products on e-commerce sites using Workers AI and Stripe Last reviewed: June 24, 2024 Developer Spotlight community contribution Written by: Hidetaka Okamoto Profile: LinkedIn External link icon Open external link E-commerce and media sites often work on increasing the average transaction value to boost profitability.

item.title: Explore Code Generation Using DeepSeek Coder Models
item.description: Explore Code Generation Using DeepSeek Coder Models Last reviewed: February 8, 2024 A handy way to explore all of the models available on Workers AI is to use a Jupyter Notebook External link icon Open external link .

item.title: Use fetch() handler
item.description: Example using fetch() handlerA very common use case is to provide the LLM with the ability to perform API calls via function calling. In this example the LLM will retrieve the weather forecast for the next 5 days.

item.title: Tools based on OpenAPI Spec
item.description: Example using tools based on OpenAPI SpecOftentimes APIs are defined and documented via OpenAPI sepc External link icon Open external link . The Cloudflare ai-utils package’s createToolsFromOpenAPISpec function creates tools from the OpenAPI spec, which the LLM can then leverage to fullfil the prompt.

item.title: Use KV API
item.description: Example using Workers KV APIInteract with persistent storage to retrieve or store information enables for powerful use cases. In this example we show how embedded function calling can interact with other resources on the Cloudflare Developer Platform with a few lines of code.

item.title: Stream OpenAI API Responses
item.description: Use the OpenAI v4 SDK to stream responses from OpenAI.

item.title: Deploy a Worker that connects to OpenAI via AI Gateway
item.description: Deploy a Worker that connects to OpenAI via AI Gateway Last reviewed: September 27, 2023 In this tutorial, you will learn how to deploy a Worker that makes calls to OpenAI through AI Gateway.

item.title: Explore Workers AI Models Using a Jupyter Notebook
item.description: Explore Workers AI Models Using a Jupyter Notebook Last reviewed: February 2, 2024 A handy way to explore all of the models available on Workers AI is to use a Jupyter Notebook External link icon Open external link .

item.title: Fine Tune Models With AutoTrain from HuggingFace
item.description: Fine Tune Models With AutoTrain from HuggingFace Last reviewed: April 1, 2024 Fine tuning an AI model gives you the opportunity to add additional training data to the model. Workers AI allows for Low-Rank Adaptation, LoRA, adapters that will allow you to finetune our models.

item.title: OpenAI GPT function calling with JavaScript and Cloudflare Workers
item.description: Use OpenAI GPT function calling with JavaScript and Cloudflare Workers Last reviewed: June 14, 2023 In this tutorial, you will build a project that leverages OpenAI’s function calling External link icon Open external link feature, available in OpenAI’s latest Chat Completions API models.
